name: Sticker Shop Simulator
description:
In Sticker Shop Simulator you manage your own sticker store. You start in a rented building and try to sell as many stickers as possible. 

To create your own stickers you can either upload your own images to the game (512 x 512) or use predefined images. You then have to print them out, cut them, package them and send them to the right buyer.

Orders in your online store always arrive at the start of the day. Depending on the size of the order, you have a certain number of days to process it. The more orders you successfully deliver, the more attention your store gets and more people order more stickers from you.

But make sure that you don't go bankrupt, otherwise you might have to open a new store and leave the old one behind.
